tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (FRAG (PP (IN In) (NP (NP (DT a) (JJ twin) (NN bed) (NN sweating)) (NP (NP (PRP$ my) (NN ass)) (PP (IN off) (S (VP (VBG listening) (PP (TO to) (S (VP (VBG snoring)))))))))) (. .)))
